title: Does the 2017 Tax Reform Bill Eliminate Small Business Deductions?
subtitle: Contrary to rumor, the tax bill does not eliminate deductions for small business expenses, though it would axe those for unreimbursed employee business expenses.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Under the 2017 tax overhaul legislation currently making its way through Congress, all deductions for business-related expenses incurred by small business owners and the self-employed would be eliminated.
